code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";function PageButtons(props){var pageChange=props.pageChange,activePage=props.activePage,totalPages=props.totalPages;var backButon=activePage>1?"":" d-none";var nextButton=activePage===totalPages?" d-none":"";return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("nav",{"aria-label":"Page navigation example"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("ul",{className:"d-flex justify-content-around pagination"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("li",{className:"page-item"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{to:"".concat(activePage-1),className:"page-link"+backButon,name:"back",onClick:function onClick(e){return pageChange(e.target.name);}},"< Page ".concat(activePage-1))),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("li",{className:"page-item"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{to:"".concat(activePage+1),className:"page-link"+nextButton,name:"next",onClick:function onClick(e){return pageChange(e.target.name);}},"Page ",activePage+1," >"))));}export default PageButtons;
